name: FROG (Tarkis)
description:
Hello,

My name is Jerome and this is the beta for my first game: FROG. The full release is going to be Tuesday 5/1/19. It's a minimalistic platformer where your character is a frog whose objective is to eat flies. There are currently 12 levels to play through, and the game can be beaten in 15-20 minutes or so.

The music is Hop Hop Master by Jonny Bartlett, created for this game.

Oh, if you get stuck - unable to jump but you can still lick - please leave a comment. I believe I have fixed this bug but I can only do so much playtesting on my own.

Enjoy
